name: Functional Impact
definition: A measure of the impact to business functionality or ability to provide services.

values.name: No Impact to Services
values.definition: Event has no impact to any business or Industrial Control Systems (ICS) services or delivery to entity customers.

values.name: Minimal Impact to Non-Critical Services
values.definition: Some small level of impact to non-critical systems and services.

values.name: Minimal Impact to Critical Services
values.definition: Minimal impact but to a critical system or service, such as email or active directory.

values.name: Significant Impact to Non-Critical Services
values.definition: A non-critical service or system has a significant impact.

values.name: Denial of Non-Critical Services
values.definition: A non-critical system is denied or destroyed.

values.name: Significant Impact to Critical Services
values.definition: A critical system has a significant impact, such as local administrative account compromise.

values.name: Denial of Critical Services/Loss of Control
values.definition: A critical system has been rendered unavailable.
